content:
The Tova Rabinowicz nee Langsam Family


From: Sol2516171@aol.com 
Date: Wed, 28 Jun 2000 22:36:21 EDT 
Subject: Re: Family Tree of the Jewish People: Tova LANGSAM 
To: moishe@langsam.com 
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 109 


Dear Moishe,


Tova Langsam married my ninth cousin twice removed (through the Teomim 
family) Yosef Rabinowicz (b. 1880).  Thus, she is not a relative of mine.  I 
could send you a GEDCOM file of what I have on his ancestors or their 
descendants if you're interested.  If you have information on their 
descendants I'd be interested.  (I checked your website but it said the index 
was under construction.)


David Solomon


In a message dated 6/18/00 9:44:48 AM Eastern Daylight Time, 
moishe@langsam.com writes:

 Hi,
 Saw your posting and was wondering if you are interested in oursuing a 
possible connection between our trees. I have a website at:
 www.langsam.com
 
 Please let me know.
 Thanks!
 -Moishe 
_________________________________________________________________________
From: Sol2516171@aol.com 
Date: Sat, 1 Jul 2000 09:48:22 EDT 
Subject: Re: Family Tree of the Jewish People: Tova LANGSAM 
To: moishe@langsam.com 
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 109

David

In a message dated 6/28/00 10:51:17 PM Eastern Daylight Time, 
moishe@langsam.com writes:


 Hi,
 Thanks for your reply. I would be most interested in whatever you could 
 send me, as it pertains to HER ancestry or descendants. Do you know where 
 they were from? Perhaps with this detail, I can find a hit on my side and 
 return the favor by giving you some info.
 
 Thanks!
 -Moishe Miller
 moishe@langsam.com
_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Thu, 12 Jul 2001 23:18:04 -0400
To: Sol2516171@aol.com
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Yosef Rabinowicz

Hi,

We have not written in a while. Do you know more about Tova Langsam and 
Yosef Rabinowicz? Where did they live? Marry? Pass on?

You offered a GEDCOM version? Would it be too much trouble to email me 
that piece?

Thanks!
Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com
_________________________________________________________________________

From: Sol2516171@aol.com 
Date: Sat, 14 Jul 2001 10:04:19 EDT 
Subject: Re: Yosef Rabinowicz 
To: moishe@langsam.com 
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 140 


Dear Moise,


As I may have mentioned, this is an extremely distant branch of my family (he 
was my ninth cousin twice removed).  Here's a GEDCOM file on what I have on 
their descendants.  I apologize if I didn't respond to an earlier request for 
it.


David

Date: Wed, 30 May 2001 22:16:02 -0700 
From: s rabinowitz  
Reply-To: solrab@hotpop.com 
To: "moishe@langsam.com"  
Subject: Bochner 

Moishe,


Thanks so much for your info!


Now that it is apparent that your wife
is related to the  Bochner family (by the 
way could you please tell me where in the tree
she fits in)


perhaps by a small miracle you can connect 
your Langsam family to this small subtree


Avraham Langsam
& Rechel Laia Strom
      Tova Langsam
      & Yosef Rabinowicz
            Leibus Rabinowicz
            & Fanny Faige Bochner



don't know anything about these Langsams but that
Yosef Rabinowicz and Tova lived in Gorlicz Poland
until shortly before 1939 when their son Leo(Leibus) 
a diamond merchant from London helped  
bring them to Tel Aviv area.


Do you recognize or know someone who recognizes 
these Langsams?



sol rabinowitz

3300 south street #102
long beach ca 90805
phone/fax 888-522-6750 (toll free) 
_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Sat, 22 Sep 2001 23:08:35 -0400
To: Sol2516171@aol.com 
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Tova Rabinowicz (nee Langsam)

Hi,
Shana Tova!

Once again, thanks for all the input regarding this branch of your family. 
Can you supply the name and address/email of one of her descendents that may 
be able to assist in connecting Tova to my LANGSAM tree?

Thanks!
Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com 

_________________________________________________________________________
From: Sol2516171@aol.com 
Date: Sun, 23 Sep 2001 13:36:09 EDT 
Subject: Re: Tova Rabinowicz (nee Langsam) 
To: moishe@langsam.com 

Sorry, this is such a distant branch that I don't have any information about 
contacting descendants.


David Solomon

_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Thu, 12 Jul 2001 23:22:46 -0400
To: Sol2516171@aol.com
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Fwd: Yosef Rabinowicz - part II

Hi,

One more thing. I notice that Leibus RABINOWICZ is listed as living on the JewishGen 
Family Tree of the Jewish People. Does he or any of his children have email? He himself 
should know who his grandparents were.

Thanks!
-Moishe
moishe@langsam.com
_________________________________________________________________________
From: Sol2516171@aol.com 
Date: Sat, 14 Jul 2001 10:05:39 EDT 
Subject: Re: Yosef Rabinowicz - part II 
To: moishe@langsam.com 

I doubt he is living since he was born in 1900.  I don't have any details on 
where his descendants may be living.


David

_________________________________________________________________________
From: Sol2516171@aol.com 
Date: Sat, 14 Jul 2001 10:06:30 EDT 
Subject: Re: Yosef Rabinowicz - part II 
To: moishe@langsam.com 


I should add that his son Norman David Rabinowitz was born in London (in 
1938), so you might try and English phone directory and see if you can find 
his address. 
_________________________________________________________________________
From: Judyrab@aol.com 
Date: Thu, 17 Jan 2002 17:06:29 EST 
Subject: I am Judith Rabinowicz 
To: moishe@langsam.com 
X-Mailer: AOL 6.0 for Windows US sub 10555 

I found your website on the internet.... I am the daughter of Ernest and 
Ina Rabinowicz, grandaughter of Leibus and Fanny.  In case you are interested 
in updates, my grandfather passed away in March of 1992; my grandmother passed 
away in November of 1994. 
I have two children: Samuel Louis Raymond, born 4/17/84 in Cincinnati Ohio, 
and Sarah Chaya Raymond, born 6/19/86 also in Cincinnati.  There are numerous 
members of this generation, in the US, UK and Israel.  The current family 
geneologist is my first cousin Victoria Rabinowicz Katzman (married to Bob 
Katzman in August 2000).  She is responsible for managing the family tree 
and can give you names and dates.  Her email address is VKatgal@hotmail.com. 

Regards and thank you for a very interesting website-- Judy 
_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Thu, 17 Jan 2002 22:23:19 -0500
To: Judyrab@aol.com, VKatgal@hotmail.com
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Re: I am Judith Rabinowicz

Hi,
Thanks for your kind words and feedback. I would be very interested in 
pursuing further the ancestry of Tova Rabinowicz nee Langsam. Who were 
her parents? Where were they from? Did she have any siblings? Do you have 
any know LANGSAM cousins?

I have a website dedicated to the LANGSAM family at 
www.langsam.com

The specific page within my site that deals with your family is
http://www1.ics.uci.edu/~dan/genealogy/Miller/langsam/tova.htm

I look forward to any feedback you might care to give.

-Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com
_________________________________________________________________________
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Date: Sat, 27 Sep 2003 09:51:15 -0400 
From: "Rachel"  
Reply-To: lambbull@lycos.com 
Subject: Rabinowicz sisters 

Dear Moishe,

It has recently come to my attention that I, Rachel Naomi Rabinowicz, 
and my three sisters, Karen, Elizabeth, and Victoria Rabinowicz are 
listed on your family tree (The Tova Rabinowicz nee Langsam Family 
branch) along with our birthdates.  For personal security and safety, 
and on behalf of my sisters, I kindly request that you remove our 
birthdate data from your online family tree. 

I would greatly appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.


Sincerely,
Rachel Rabinowicz
_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Thu, 23 Oct 2003 23:37:05 -0400
To: lambbull@lycos.com
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Re: Rabinowicz sisters

Hi,

Sorry for the delay in responding. Yes, I can remove those dates. 
Can you tell me anything more regarding Tova Rabinowitz nee Langsam? 
Who were her parents? Where did she live? Did she have any siblings? 

Thanks!
Moishe
_________________________________________________________________________


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 6/23/04
